## The decluttering checklist

Before you call a figure "done," ask:

- Is the background gray? â†’ Switch to `theme_minimal()` or `theme_classic()`
- Are there gridlines? â†’ Remove them
- Is there a legend when there's only one group? â†’ Remove it
- Do the axis labels say something meaningful? â†’ If not, rename them
- Can someone understand the point without reading the caption? â†’ If not, the title needs work
:::

### Colorblind-friendly palettes

```r
# Viridis â€” works for continuous and discrete
scale_fill_viridis_d()   # discrete categories
scale_fill_viridis_c()   # continuous values

# ColorBrewer â€” curated palettes
scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set2")      # qualitative
scale_fill_brewer(palette = "RdBu")      # diverging
scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Blues")     # sequential
```

These are all built into ggplot2 â€” no extra packages needed.
